traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The dragonpriest has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
entries: The dragonpriest regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the dragonpriest takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the dragonpriest's next turn. The dragonpriest dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragonpriest makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage.
